question: In the future, more people will choose to go on holiday in their own country and not travel abroad on holiday. Do you agree or disagree?
text: Travelling overseas is hugely important in this modern society and this subject has always been one of the most highly debated issues among the population nowadays. A group of people is believed staying in their country is safer than before. However, other opinions that travelling choices support the economic wealth of the world. This essay will discuss journeying must continue despite every harsh occasion.

To begin with, for now, the main disadvantage of going to another country for a holiday is a disease infection possibility. Every countries circumstance and health helping reachable conditions are different that is also always is changing day-to-day. That is why population rejects to visit a long-distance place to feel better and stay healthy. For instance, we have to be vaccinated if we would go to Africa or Asia owing to the rules and regulations of government. In this manner, international travelling is preferred less more by human.

It is also worth saying that, important to emphasize, travellers always effect to the economic standing globally. Some countries could not stand and maintain a stable economy without tourism. Even a range of locations just provides their incomes from tourist attractions. For instance, Venice in Italy compensates their economical raising from people who came from other parts of the world. Correspondingly, if the trips are stopped many financial charts will drop dramatically and accurately.

In conclusion, it is a well-known fact that implementing voyage is an individual need for everybody in universally.  This essay discussed why the population should have incentives for doing travelling in every occasion. In my opinion, knowing health and safety rules according to the hazards and also applying them would eliminate most of major risks in our life.
